name: Tic Tac Toe
description: The classic game of X's and O's with three difficulty levels of AI opponents.
fullDescription:
Tic Tac Toe is a classic paper-and-pencil game for two players who take turns marking X and O on a 3Ã—3 grid. The player who succeeds in placing three of their marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row is the winner.

In this digital version, you play as X against a computer opponent (O) with three difficulty levels:

  • Easy: The computer makes random moves
  • Medium: The computer can block your winning moves and make its own winning moves
  • Hard: The computer uses the minimax algorithm to play perfectly

Challenge yourself against the AI and see if you can outsmart it!
author: WebGameMulti Team
controls: Click or tap on a cell to place your mark. Select difficulty from the dropdown menu.
